## About Plex
Plex transforms your personal media collection into a professionally presented streaming service accessible from virtually any device. The platform serves as a comprehensive media solution that organizes movies, TV shows, music, photos, and home videos into an intuitive interface with automatic metadata retrieval. By combining the convenience of commercial streaming services with the personalization of your own content library, Plex creates a unified entertainment ecosystem that adapts to your viewing preferences and technical requirements.

The desktop application provides robust media server capabilities for both macOS and Windows environments, featuring hardware-accelerated transcoding, bandwidth optimization, and multi-user support with personalized watchlists and recommendations. Plex's client-server architecture ensures optimal playback quality across different devices and network conditions while maintaining centralized management of your entire media library. With support for live TV and DVR functionality through compatible tuners, Plex extends beyond stored media to become a complete entertainment hub for modern households.

## âš™ï¸ System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS Monterey 12.0 or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   500 MB of available storage space for application

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 10 (64-bit) or later
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   500 MB of available storage space for application
